```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)
```

```{r}
geojson <- pins::pin("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/datasets/geo-countries/master/data/countries.geojson") %>% 
  jsonlite::fromJSON(simplifyVector = FALSE)
```

```{r}
library(gapminder)
```


```{r}
geojson$style = list(
  weight = 1,
  color = "#555555",
  opacity = 1,
  fillOpacity = 0.8
)

gdp_md_est <- sapply(geojson$features, function(feat) {
  feat$properties$gdp_md_est
})

gdp_md_est <- 
  geojson$features %>% 
  map_dbl("properties", "gdp_md_est")
 
```
